---
title: "Introduction to Linux and the Shell"
author: "Angelika Merkel"
---

This course gives a brief introduction to Linux and Shell programming. 

**Topics covered:**

* What is Linux?
* Moving around the system
* Basic file and directory handling
* File properties
* File viewing
* Text file manipulation
* Vim text editor
* How to create and run a shell script
* Shell variables and control structures (if-else, for-loop, while-loop)


The presentation from the course can be found [here](data/Introduction_to_Linux.June2024.pdf) and the exercises (with solutions) [here](linux_exercises.qmd).
